user_group.name: Cape Town MS Developer User Group
user_group.description: Connecting developers, sharing knowledge, and building the future with Microsoft technologies in the Mother City

homepage.title: Cape Town MS Developer User Group - Home
homepage.description: Join 1,875 passionate developers in Cape Town exploring Microsoft technologies, .NET, Azure, AI, and modern development practices.

about.title: About - Cape Town MS Developer User Group
about.description: Learn about Cape Town MS Developer User Group - A vibrant community of 1,875 developers passionate about Microsoft technologies, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing.

meetups.title: Meetups - Cape Town MS Developer User Group
meetups.description: Cape Town Microsoft Developer User Group meetups - Join our community of 1,875 developers for exciting events covering .NET, Azure, C#, and cutting-edge Microsoft technologies.

speakers.title: Speakers - Cape Town MS Developer User Group
speakers.description: Meet our amazing speakers at Cape Town Microsoft Developer User Group - Learn from industry experts, Microsoft MVPs, and passionate developers sharing their knowledge.

conferences.title: Previous Conferences - Cape Town MS Developer User Group
conferences.description: Explore our major conferences including .NET Conf, Azure Bootcamp, AI & Azure Expedition events. Featuring international speakers and cutting-edge technology.

dotnet-conf-2025.title: .Net Conf 2025 SA - MSDUG Community Edition | Cape Town Microsoft Developer User Group
dotnet-conf-2025.description: Join us for .Net Conf 2025 SA - All about .NET 10! Coming soon to Cape Town and Johannesburg

contact.title: Contact - Cape Town MS Developer User Group
contact.description: Get in touch with the Cape Town MS Developer User Group. Join our community, submit speaking proposals, or reach out for collaboration opportunities.

events.title: VS Code Dev Days - Cape Town
events.description: This special global initiative focused on AI-assisted coding with GitHub Copilot is part of the worldwide VS Code Dev Days event series. Join us for hands-on labs and workshops with industry experts!

events.title: RAG + Building a WordPress Site From Scratch
events.description: Join us for two dynamic sessions: Learn practical RAG implementation to bring your own data to AI for smarter responses, followed by an entertaining 60-minute challenge to build a complete WordPress site from scratch. From AI innovation to web development mastery!
events.venue: Accso South Africa, Clock Tower, V&A Waterfront

events.title: Programming with Agents Without It Going Off in Weird Directions
events.description: Explore how to work effectively with AI coding agents like GitHub Copilot so they stay on track across sessions, multiple contributors, and complex projects. Learn practical strategies for consistent, high-quality results with a live demo.

events.title: CPTMSDUG - Games Night
events.description: Join us for the annual CPTMSDUG Games Night! End the year with fun, games, and prizes. Details about specific games and prizes to be announced soon.
events.venue: Accso South Africa, Clock Tower, V&A Waterfront (pending confirmation)

events.title: .NET Conf 2025 South Africa Community Edition
events.description: Join us for the annual .NET Conf celebration across three major South African cities! Experience the latest in .NET development, connect with fellow developers, and celebrate the .NET community. Event details to be announced soon.

speakers.name: Joylynn Kirui
speakers.bio: Senior Cloud Security Advocate at Microsoft

speakers.name: Engaged Audience
speakers.bio: Reach 50-100+ engaged developers in each session, with our community of 1,875+ members online.

speakers.name: Networking
speakers.bio: Connect with local tech leaders, Microsoft MVPs, and passionate developers in Cape Town's vibrant tech scene.

speakers.name: Optional Recording
speakers.bio: Build your speaker portfolio with optional session recordings for your professional development and future opportunities.

speakers.name: Recognition
speakers.bio: Gain recognition in the community, build your reputation, and potentially earn Microsoft community recognition.

speakers.name: Submit Your Session Proposal
speakers.bio: Use our Sessionize portal to submit your speaking proposal and session details.

conferences.title: AI & Azure Expedition
conferences.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of artificial intelligence for an evening of discovery and insight. 
                                Following the AI Tour Johannesburg Conference, this special Cape Town event featured international 
                                and local speakers including Microsoft FTEs and Microsoft MVPs, all live and in-person!

conferences.title: .NET Conf 2024
conferences.description:
Welcome to .NET Conf South Africa – where innovation meets technology in the heart of Africa! 
                                With 2 tracks in each city and a lineup of 18+ expert speakers, this conference featured the 
                                latest .NET 9 announcements, enhanced performance, and expanded capabilities in web, mobile, 
                                IoT and cloud development.

conferences.title: Microsoft Season of AI 2024
conferences.description:
Dive into the world of artificial intelligence for an evening filled with exploration and insight. 
                                Discover the latest advancements, engage in thought-provoking discussions, and gain a deeper 
                                understanding of AI's impact on our lives through this fascinating field.

conferences.title: .NET Conf 2023
conferences.description:
Welcome to .NET Conf South Africa – where innovation meets technology in the heart of Africa! 
                                With 2 tracks in each city and 18 expert speakers, this conference provided a platform for 
                                learning and networking around .NET 8 and the rapidly evolving .NET landscape.

conferences.title: Azure Bootcamp South Africa 2021
conferences.description: We are excited to announce that Azure BootCamp South Africa (#AzureBootcampSouthAfrica) will be taking place on Thursday 30 September 2021!!

conferences.title: Stay Updated on Future Conferences
conferences.description: Don't miss our upcoming conferences and special events! Join our community to be the first to know about new conferences, speakers, and registration dates.

dotnet_conf.title: .Net Conf 2025 SA - MSDUG Community Edition | Cape Town Microsoft Developer User Group
dotnet_conf.description: Join us for .Net Conf 2025 SA - All about .NET 10! Coming soon to Cape Town and Johannesburg
content_sections:
.Net Conf 2025 SA
All About .NET 10
MSDUG Community Edition - Coming Soon to Cape Town and Johannesburg




Cape Town
Stay tuned for venue and date announcements






Johannesburg
Stay tuned for venue and date announcements

About .Net Conf 2025 SA
Join the South African developer community for a local celebration of .Net Conf 2025 - All about .NET 10!









Community Driven

Organized by the local Microsoft Developer User Groups (MSDUG) in Cape Town and Johannesburg, bringing together passionate .NET developers from across South Africa.










Latest .NET 10

Discover the groundbreaking innovations in .NET 10, including performance improvements, new language features, cloud-native enhancements, and the future

What to Expect





Technical Sessions
In-depth technical presentations covering .NET 10 features, performance enhancements, new APIs, and real-world implementations from local and international speakers.






Hands-on Workshops
Interactive workshops where you can get hands-on experience with .NET 10's new features, tools, and development patterns. Bring your laptop and code along!






Panel Discussions
Engaging panel discussions with industry experts about .NET 10's impact on development, th

Stay Updated
Be the first to know when registration opens and get event details
